overview:
J. Trent Adams is a technologist, product strategist, and futurist. He is currently an Outreach Specialist at the Internet Society (ISOC), working on the Trust & Identity initiative.

Adams was previously a the founder of a startup developing a portable preference and recommendation solution called Matchmine. He was also an Executive Producer for digital media production and the Chief Innovator for the Kraft Sports Group. In that capacity, he was the architect of the web portals and e-commerce solutions for the New England Patriots.

Adams is active in the DataPortability Project, a member of Liberty Alliance, contributor to Project VRM, and participant in the Semantic Web and Linked Data communities based in Boston.
